name: Paleo Kale Chips
author: IndianaKathy
summary: Paleo kale chips. I divide this in to two batches. My husband likes garlic, I like without garlic.
ingredients: 1 bunch kale, ribs removed and leaves torn into pieces
1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray
Put kale in a bowl and add coconut oil; mix with your hands until evenly coated
Spread coated kale onto the prepared baking sheet
Sprinkle garlic salt, salt, and pepper over kale
Place baking sheet in the oven and turn off oven
Leave kale in the oven until crisp, about 20 minutes
